oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Economics, food and markets research under research program for organic food and farming in Finland
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nykänen, Arja
Heikkilä, Anna-Maija
Huhtala, Anni
Kottila, Marja-Riitta
Lätti, Markku
Mäkelä, Johanna
Seppänen, Laura
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets and trade
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In a three-year Research program of organic food and farming in Finland there are five projects under the theme of economics, food and markets. The projects focus on local and organic food systems, environmental economy of organic farming, farm co-operation and economy of suckler cow-based beef production. First results are now available.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Nykänen, Arja; Heikkilä, Anna-Maija; Huhtala, Anni; Kottila, Marja-Riitta; Lätti, Markku; Mäkelä, Johanna and Seppänen, Laura (2005) Economics, food and markets research under research program for organic food and farming in Finland. MTT Agrifood Research Finland, Ecological Production. [Unpublished]
